mapper.select: select st.*,sm.major_id,scc.collage_id,sr.role_id from school_student as st left join school_class as sc on st.class_id = sc.class_id left join school_major as sm on sm.major_id = sc.major_id left join school_collage as scc on scc.collage_id = sm.collage_id left join stu_role as sr on sr.stu_id = st.stu_id where st.stu_id =#{stuId}
